snippet.title: You Have a Point There: A Guide to Punctuation and Its Allies
snippet.description: This standard work on punctuation has long been judged the foremost study of the subject. It reveals punctuation to be both an indispensable craft and an invaluable art - a friend, not an enemy.

snippet.title: English Grammar, Punctuation and Usage (Grammar Card Guides)
snippet.description: This quick-reference card outlines fundamentals of English grammar on durable varnished stock, punched to fit standard three-ring notebook binders.
